name: Strength & Virtue: Lord of Midchester
description:
Take on the monumental task of managing a small town caught between two powerful city-states in this 2.5D RPG! Rebuild your township, explore dungeons, hire underlings, grow your town's prosperity and catch the attention of powerful potential allies or foes... you decide!



In this very lore-enriched game, customize your player character and take on the mantle of 'Lord of Midchester.'



Features:
* Charming 2.5D aesthetic
* Gorgeous Pixel Art
* Real-time dynamic shadows and lighting
* Grounded medieval fantasy
* Rebuild your township in the order you see fit
* Explore caves and dungeons in 1st-person
* Battle dangerous critters
* Uncover the tumultuous history of the region of Midland
* The first entry in an epic magnum opus of projects exploring the world of Taharen
